venue.name: The American Legion: Nonatum Post No 440

item.description:
Come out and enjoy good food, music and company while we celebrate our 20th year as a chapter of the National Marfan Foundation.  Help us to honor the lives of those who have or are suspected of having Marfan Syndrome.For more information, contact Jonathan Rodis by e-mail at jrmarfan58@aol.com. 

 

Cost

$25 if paid before May 14.  $30 at the door. 

Directions

From points north (such as Cambridge): Take Route 16, aka Mt. Auburn Street to Watertown Square. Take Route 16 through the square, crossing Main Street, aka Route 20, & the Charles River. Take the first right immediately after the bridge, continuing on Route 16, which changes name to Watertown Street, then immediately take the right fork onto California Street. The American Legion Post is 0.7 miles ahead on your right.
item.why: The Marfan Foundation is the official charity of Tall Clubs' International
item.name: National Marfan Foundation Dance & Auction
